Private Offering Memorandum

STR Market Overview & Analysis

Short Term Rentals offer todays real estate investors a unique and growing market in a challenging macro climate.

Big Picture Overview

Short Term Rentals outperformed all other real estate investments in 2021 & 2022

The sector saw growth on every front, with no signs of slowing down. Post pandemic 'revenge travel' gave STR investors highest returns to date.

High Growth

88,000 New short-term rentals added in May 2022

Unique Stays Preffered

OMG/Experiential short-term rentals have the fastest growth

Solid Demand

Airbnb Q2 2022 earnings noted that bookings for unique homes were up 80% compared to pre-pandemic levels.

Domes Do Better

Airbnb DOME bookings were up 134%.

AIRBNBs are Quickly Becoming Their Own Asset Class

The Sector is Poised for Institutional Players to Come in

Platforms like Realpha.com have raised hundreds of millions of dollars to acquire and build out a portfolio of AirBnBs betting that STRs becoming their own real estate investment class.

Dedicated lenders like Host Financial are building lending markets based on actual and anticipated short term rental income and revenues.

Big data platforms like AirDna are providing institutional investors the market insights they need to take the guess work out of STR investments.

70%

STRs generate 70% or higher revenue than long-term rentals.

$34B

Airbnb hosts earned a record of $34 Billion in 2022.

77.6%

In 2022, Airbnb listing revenue was up 76.6% from 2022.

4M

4M hosts now on the Airbnb platform and millions more will be needed to meet demand.

Build a global real estate portfolio.

Real Estate Investing For Everybody.

Investing with Zomes, is similar to owning a rental property, however with us you don't have to worry about day-to-day property management and in the periods of vacancy the borrower is required to distribute fixed-interest payments.

Start Exploring How It Works
Start Building your Short Term Rental Portfolio

Why Invest in Short Term Rentals?

Adding STRs to your real estate portfolio has many strategic advantages

Passive Income

Mature hosting services means little to no management headaches.

Stable Cash Flow

In contrast to commercial tenants, STR vacancies are measured in days, not months or years.

Strong Exit Story

STR properties appeal to both Investors and Residential buyers.

Low Margin Hospitality

AirBnBs perform similarly to hotels when it comes to revenue, but run at less than half their management costs.

Inflation protection

Home values and rents typically increase during times of inflation

Diversification

Low correlation to other real-estate asset classes

Smart way to raise money

The Opportunity of Unique Stays

Demand for Unique AirBnb Stays is Outmatching Supply

Airbnbâ€™s Q2 2022 earnings noted that nights booked for unique homes were up 80 percent compared to pre-pandemic levels.

Tiny houses (+173%), barns (+160%), domes (134%), and treehouses (+116%) also saw particularly strong interest.

Airbnb recently introduced a new category of properties titled â€˜OMGâ€™ which captures the most luxurious, unique, and exclusive accommodations listed on the site. These properties stand out from the rest with their next-level amenities, outstanding service, and high-end furnishings.

In 2022 AirBnb launched a $10M OMG competition to choose the best 100 OMG concept homes, and fund their buildout.

Zomes was selected as a winner out of tens of thousands of applicants.
